originalText.text: Needed to get 3 screens replaced. Vin did a great job from the initial visit to my house to give an estimate, measured the screens to the instillation the following weekend. My screens look so nice!

text.text: Needed to get 3 screens replaced. Vin did a great job from the initial visit to my house to give an estimate, measured the screens to the instillation the following weekend. My screens look so nice!

originalText.text: Had a great experience with Charles Door Repair & Installation for getting screens doors for my home! The doors are great quality for a good price! Definitely will use them again and highly recommend!!

text.text: Had a great experience with Charles Door Repair & Installation for getting screens doors for my home! The doors are great quality for a good price! Definitely will use them again and highly recommend!!

originalText.text: I used the company to rescreen a retractable screen door. They arrived promptly, took the door and returned 2 days later. It looks brand new now. 5 star service.

text.text: I used the company to rescreen a retractable screen door. They arrived promptly, took the door and returned 2 days later. It looks brand new now. 5 star service.

originalText.text: This was our first time having screens installed in our home, and it was a fantastic experience start to finish. Big thanks to Charles Door Repair & Installation!

text.text: This was our first time having screens installed in our home, and it was a fantastic experience start to finish. Big thanks to Charles Door Repair & Installation!

originalText.text: FYI, this is a scam company so far as I can tell after investigating as much as possible. Both of the provided phone numbers at their website, and in this Google listing, go to totally different companies that have nothing to do with door repair and installation (instead, "small business loans" and a locksmith). The people who answer the phones claim that the numbers are different, too, making it all the more suspicious.
